# 1 Summary statistics
Show and discuss summary statistics of the car market in the five EU countries. Focus on what you believe are key variables given the questions at hand.

```{r}
summary_stats <- function(x){
  summary <- rbind(mean(x), sd(x)) 
  return(summary)
}


df %>% select(pr, year) %>% map(function(x) summary_stats(x)) %>% as_tibble() %>% t() %>% round(2) %>% as_tibble(rownames = "Variable") %>% rename ("Mean" = V1, "S.e." = V2)
```
